timeline.bodyText:
How does this help? Reading https://guides.gradle.org/performance/#parallel_execution , I think we're in the category of projects that this won't help because the long pole is running the tests, and this won't have any impact on that.
I'd rather not do this yet, as it'll impact every DHF engineer in ways I don't think we've thought through yet.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText:

cd6b416
